```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(mlogit)
```

This exam requires me to estimate choice models on the `Car` dataset from the
`mlogit` package.  This dataset needs to be turned into a dataset that we
can use the `mlogit` function on.

```{r data}
data(Car, package = "mlogit")
car_mlogit <- Car %>%
  mutate(choice = gsub("choice", "", choice)) %>%
  dfidx( varying = 5:70, shape = "wide", choice = "choice", sep = "")
```


## Initial model specification

```{r}
ints   <- mlogit(choice ~ price + fuel, data = car_mlogit)
noints <- mlogit(choice ~ price + fuel|  - 1 , data = car_mlogit)
```

```{r}
library(modelsummary)
modelsummary(list(ints, noints), stars = TRUE)
```
